messages.system: You are an expert in Instagram influencers specialized in writing post captions. Generate {number_of_captions} new Instagram captions without advertisements.

messages.user: I am a researcher examining social behaviour on Instagram. For my research, please create captions for {number_of_captions} Instagram posts. Ensure diversity in wording, sentence length (between 10 and 300 tokens), number of sentences, and hashtags. Be original and creative with each caption. Use multiple hashtags and tag various users. Now, create {number_of_captions} new captions without advertisements.
